Class RulesSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gcn.plinguacore.util.psystem.rule.RulesSet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Set<IRule>, java.io.Serializable
    A Set for rules
    Author:
    Research Group on Natural Computing (http://www.gcn.us.es)
